content: {"name": "RMBC Missions Place Food Pantry Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": " Please call 704-802-9548 to make an appointment to visit our Pantry, leave a message and your call will be returned within 2 business days.", "email": "", "url": "https://reederministries.org/missions-place/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3715 Beatties Ford Road", "address_2": "Missions Place", "city": "Firestone - Garden Park", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28216", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2850995, "longitude": -80.8600458}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 398-2914", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must be income-eligible"}]}
